content.content: With DAI needing to be placed into the DSR contract (post both MCD launch and DSR launch), how will xDAI function then? I suppose DAI placed into the bridge contract could also be locked in the DSR as well. Has anyone explored this?
content.GPT-summary: The post is asking a question about the functionality of DAI and xDAI in relation to the DSR contract. The author is seeking feedback and constructive criticism on the idea of locking DAI in the DSR through the bridge contract. The post extends to the community by asking if anyone has explored this idea.

content.content: Are you asking if there is a mechanism for dai being locked in multiple contracts at the same time? This seems to be in contradiction with the locking concept. I understand how ethereum works only superficially, but i doubt you could do this without creating a new (proxy) contract. Basically makerdao and bridge contract creators would need to cooperate.
GPT-discussion-categories: 3rd party giving constructive criticism of proposal
